entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
